ValidationRule.description: Language restriction for Prospect account creation for account name field Requirement # 3341... changes validation rule for req#5060
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name , $RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Prospect' , OR( NOT( REGEX(Name ,'^[a-zA-Z\\d\\p{Punct}\\p{Space}]+') ) , AND( NOT(ISBLANK ( BillingCity )), NOT(REGEX( BillingCity ,"^[a-zA-Z\\d\\p{Punct}\\p{Space}]+")) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK ( BillingStreet )), NOT(REGEX( BillingStreet ,"^[a-zA-Z\\d\\p{Punct}\\p{Space}]+")) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK ( Notes__c )), NOT(REGEX( Notes__c ,"^[a-zA-Z\\d\\p{Punct}\\p{Space}]+")) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK ( Website )), NOT(REGEX( Website ,"^[a-zA-Z\\d\\p{Punct}\\p{Space}]+")) ), AND( NOT(ISBLANK ( BillingPostalCode )), NOT(REGEX( BillingPostalCode ,"^[a-zA-Z\\d\\p{Punct}\\p{Space}]+")) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Digit, Letter and Punctuation of English language can be filled in.
